original_title: Pink Floyd - The Later Years: Delicate Sound of Thunder film (Restored & Remixed)
overview: The band's 1988 concert film Delicate Sound of Thunder presented in a digitally remastered and re-edited picture and remixed audio in both 5.1 surround sound and stereo. This release also makes "Money" available in PAL regions for the first time.  "Shine On You Crazy Diamond (Parts 1â€“5)" "Signs of Life" "Learning to Fly" "Sorrow" "The Dogs of War" "On the Turning Away" "One of These Days" "Time" "On the Run" "The Great Gig in the Sky" "Wish You Were Here" "Us and Them" "Money" (previously unavailable in PAL regions) "Comfortably Numb" "One Slip" "Run Like Hell" "Terminal Frost" (audio only; end credits)
tagline: The band's 1988 concert film Delicate Sound of Thunder presented in a digitally remastered and re-edited picture and remixed audio in both 5.1 surround sound and stereo.
title: Pink Floyd - The Later Years: Delicate Sound of Thunder film (Restored & Remixed)
